bug.author: suquark
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Many Windows CI tests fails with crazy messages like address violation for a while recently. Does anyone know what happen? (or it just because windows CI is very flaky now?)
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments.comment: (closing this since we have windows CI issue)
